properties.body:
WESTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL 23 DEC BY
   M/V BGP CHALLENGER TOWING 12000 METER LONG CABLE
   IN AREAS BOUND BY:
   A. 26-38S 044-53W, 26-34S 044-58W,
      26-21S 044-23W, 26-24S 044-18W,
      26-25S 044-11W, 26-25S 044-03W,
      26-41S 044-49W.
   B. 27-27S 045-38W, 27-24S 045-43W,
      27-37S 045-31W, 27-40S 045-27W,
      27-45S 045-15W, 27-41S 045-20W,
      27-31S 045-34W.
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 24 DEC 17.
